title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Bali ATV Ride and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Bali ATV Ride and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun actually deciphers as "wonderful arrangement' and is for the most part viewed as a standout amongst the most appealing sanctuaries of Bali. Taman Ayun is arranged in a lovely stop with trees and lakes, close to the town of Mengwi in the south of Bali at around 8 km southwest of Ubud and 18 km northwest of Denpasar. Pura Taman Ayun was inherent 1634 by the Raja of Mengwi, I Gusti Agung Putu. It is a socalled 'Pura Kawiten' or family sanctuary, an exceptional sanctuary where the worshipped predecessors of the Raja Dynasty of Mengwi and imperative lords of different sanctuaries are respected.

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple is a famous visitor and social symbol for photography and general exoticism. Tanah Lot is asserted to be the work of the sixteenth century Dang Hyang Nirartha. Amid his goes along the south drift he saw the rock-island's wonderful setting and rested there. Some anglers saw him, and purchased him endowments. Nirartha then spent the night on the little island. Later he addresses the anglers and let them know to assemble a holy place on the rock, for he felt it to be a heavenly place to love the Balinese ocean divine beings.

price.title: Bali ATV Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Packages Price :
price.content:
Bali ATV Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Packages Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,300,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,000,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 900,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 850,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 825,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali ATV Ride and Tanah Lot Tour Packages Price Included :

  • Comfortable A/C Private Car
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Mineral Water
  • Entrance Fee to all site
  • 2 Hours ATV Ride Adventure
  • ATV Bike (Single ATV Bike or Tandem ATV Bike)
  • Professional ATV Instructor
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage during ATV Ride

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
